actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to insure a comprehensive, periodic review of United States participation in the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund.
short_title: Bretton Woods Agreements Review Act of 1978

summary.text: Bretton Woods Agreements Review Act of 1978 - Amends the Bretton Woods Agreements Act to make any authorizations granted pursuant to such Act effective only through September 30, 1981.

titles.title: Bretton Woods Agreements Review Act of 1978
A bill to insure a comprehensive, periodic review of United States participation in the World Bank and the International Monetary Fund.
